mapper.select: select b.name, sum(value) as value from asset_allocation a join people b on a.people_code = b.code join assets_type c on a.assets_type_code = c.code where a.date = (select max(date) from asset_allocation) group by b.name

select a.date, c.describle as assetsTypeDes , sum(a.value) as value from asset_allocation a join people b on a.people_code = b.code join assets_type c on a.assets_type_code = c.code where b.code = #{peopleCode} group by a.date, c.describle

select a.date, c.describle as assetsTypeDes, sum(a.value) as value from asset_allocation a join people b on a.people_code = b.code join assets_type c on a.assets_type_code = c.code group by a.date, c.describle

select b.name, c.describle as assetsTypeDes, sum(value) as value from asset_allocation a join people b on a.people_code = b.code join assets_type c on a.assets_type_code = c.code where a.date = (select max(date) from asset_allocation) and b.code = #{peopleCode} group by c.code, c.describle, b.name

select c.describle as assetsTypeDes, sum(value) as value from asset_allocation a join people b on a.people_code = b.code join assets_type c on a.assets_type_code = c.code where a.date = (select max(date) from asset_allocation) group by c.code, c.describle
